website_summaries.verdict: A great serum for improving the signs of aging that can also help with acne.
pros: Features a retinol ester that helps minimize fine lines and wrinkles
CoQ10 helps improve signs of aging and sun damage
Moisturizes while exfoliating and can help reduce breakouts
cons: Those who haven't used retinoids before should start slowly and work up to nightly use

customer_reviews.title: Not for first time users
customer_reviews.text: I like this retinoid - it goes on well, no scent and helps my skin. I have sensitive skin but I have been gradually upping the percentage of retinol in my products through the year so have had no reaction. I would NOT recommend this product who has never used retinol and is looking for a "quick fix" thinking that more is better. There are two things I have learned - make sure your face is completely dry before applying and let your skin get used to the product before going at it full on. Otherwise, you end up with skin that looks and feels like you have been sitting out in the sun for 18 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have used retinal items before and only gotten so-so results. Like many others, I got this as a sample in a Birch Box. From the first time I used it, I noticed a difference. I ordered this in a regular size and have LOVED how it makes my skin look. The fine lines are gone and my skin is so much softer. This is a strong retinal formula, so use with caution if you have sensitive skin. I will continue to use this product as it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Huskerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: A miracle As a cancer survivors My face was damaged after 6 months of chemotherapy But this great product was recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Laura m vivanco

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome , highly recommended for every women.
customer_reviews.text: I was going through the difficult time of my life then my daughter told me about this product I bought it from Sephora and fell in love with it as soon as I started using this, I was not expecting the results that I saw after using it..
customer_reviews.author: zehra ghory

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best serum I have ever used. I have tried many serums and this one has shown the best result. Skin is smooth, even toned and love how it goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Attyah

customer_reviews.title: Great over the counter retinol
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this product. Been using retinol for 22 yrs now. I usually get my retinol from a doctors office. This is a great product and not as strong as the professional strength. My skin has been flaking which is great. My skin looks fresh and smoother after one week.
customer_reviews.author: mindy lendino

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I’m pretty impressed with this serum. Used many expensive and drugstore brands, this blew them all away. My skin texture, brightness and overall clarity have improved tremendously. Will definitely keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but such a great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints about this company's products. I instantly fell in love with their oils.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Never I will recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Really didnt like it ...my face has a big reaction
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks and feels better than it has in years. I’m sold on this product!
customer_reviews.author: J Burnell

customer_reviews.title: My favorite night cream of all times!
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels soft and silky to the touch in the morning. I apply prior to bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Inga-Britt Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am perplexed by the negative reviews. I have sensitive skin and I absolutely love this product. I am 50 years-old and I put this product on at nighttime before I go to bed and wake up with soft, dewy skin. I am a beauty product junkie and this is my favourite serum of all the many that I have tried over the years.
customer_reviews.author: tikimom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about trying this product as I have sensitive skin. This is a picture is after 3 day usage. I applied it after the shower (clean dry face). I'm seriously in love and would definitely repurchase. It is a bit pricey but it works like magic. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nisserene Abdulaal

customer_reviews.title: No improvements
customer_reviews.text: I know how beneficial retinol is so I thought I’d give this a try. I’m giving it four stars because I saw no improvements but I also know it takes time to see a noticeable change. Also, oddly this product did not come with a safety seal or anything to show the product is unopened. I am unsure if this is the standard with Sunday Riley or not.
customer_reviews.author: Zayn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The best retinol I have ever used. It’s been a week and I’m already seeing results. I’ve been using other retinols for years and decided to move to a higher strength one. I was worried about burning, but haven’t had any issues. I will definitely buy it again when my vial runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my night routine, but i didn’t notice any different, I probably will give it more time and prouwill reordering it
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Abdulwahab

customer_reviews.title: So smooth. Great for wrinkle reduction!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different retinol products in the past and when Sunday Riley came out with this new line... I was so excited! Let me just say, it absolutely does not disappoint. Now, it is strong, so if you have never used retinol before, start with a smaller concentration (such as SR Luna Oil) because it can dry your skin out if you aren’t used to it. With that in mind, A+ is so smooth and leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. It has really done wonders to reduce fine wrinkles around my eyes and forehead. This is a high quality product and one you should have in your bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Best retinol based serum I've ever owned. But if you've never used retinol, don't start with this as it's very powerful. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: It’s crap
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is useless. Overpriced garbage. Don’t waste your money. Beware of the false Sephora claims they were written by S Riley Co shame on this company
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline OFlaherty

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After two nights of using this, it looked like my skin had burned around my eyes . I quit using it, but even three days later the skin around my eyes still look burned and stings. I don’t have sensitive skin either.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Sunday Riley A High-Dose Retinoid Serum, 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum combines a 5% retinoid ester blend, 1% liposomal-encapsulated retinol blend, and 0.5% blue green algae with natural retinoid-alternative activity, this serum fights the signs of aging and improves the look of congested and UV damaged skin. Encapsulated CoQ10 helps to improve the appearance of aging or damaged skin, while Hawaiian white honey, bisabolol, cactus extract, and ginger balance and soothe the skin for the appearance of a calmer more even-toned complexion. Includes a 30ml A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum, 5ml C.E.O. Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil and a 3ml Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment

BRAND STORY
Sunday Riley uses only cutting-edge technology and the highest quality ingredients, for instant, noticeable results, without compromise. Welcome to the world of Sunday Riley – clean formulas, for results you can feel good about.
